revision.text:
==About== This is a collection of C++ command line programs to work with .WAD files. It consists of:
*Make_Wad : Makes a WAD file *Break_Wad : Exports the contents of a WAD file *Group_Wad : Combines WAD file contents *Show_Wad : Prints the contents of a WAD file to the console
==External Links== *{{forum|Make Wad ZDoom forum thread|t=10544}} *{{forum|Break Wad ZDoom forum thread|t=10641}} *[http://jwellis86.home.insightbb.com/ Download at the official website] [[Category:Dead software]]
